article.headline: âVote him out!â President Trump booed during visit to RBGâs casket
article.body: President Donald Trump and first lady Melania Trump pay their respects to Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg's flag-draped casket. Alex Wong/Getty Images One of his adoring rallies this clearly was not. A masked President Donald Trump visited Ruth Bader Ginsburgâs casket at the Supreme Court on Thursday, where he was promptly met with boos and chants of âvote him outâ and âhonor her wish.â Hereâs some of the footage: iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } The âhonor her wishâ chant was in reference to Trumpâs overlooking of the late justiceâs reported dying wish to not be replaced before the election. iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } As video of the jeers was passed around social media, the #VoteHimOut hashtag became the top-trending topic on Twitter TWTR, -0.23% as the president was hammered by his critics: iframe.twitter-tweet { width: 100% !important; } White House Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany said that the chants were âappallingâ but not surprising, considering they came from âthe heart of the swampâ in Washington D.C. âI travel with the president all across the country â Pennsylvania, North Carolina, Florida, Nevada â and everywhere we go the streets are lined with support like I donât think any other president has had,â she said.
